item.title: Bachelor's Degree Capstone Project: Incident Response Plan part 1
item.description: The following is part 1 of the Incident Response Plan that I submitted as my final capstone project for my BS in CyberSecurity at Colorado Technical University, and was originally written March 18, 2018. I decided to publish it to demonstrate the work I’ve done, as well as in the hope that someone will get some benefit from it. Abstract The role of incident response at any organization is an important one.
